name: Finn O'Donnell
traits: One eye is milky white, smells of brine and cheap whiskey, has a tattoo of a kraken on his forearm.
motivation: To make enough money to get out of Arkham for good.
secret: On his last run from Innsmouth, he smuggled a small, lead-lined box for a client. The box whispers to him at night, and he's terrified to open it or get rid of it.
hook: The investigators are looking for illicit goods or passage on a boat, or are tracking the origin of a strange artifact.
